schema.description: This view provides pricing condition details from the prcd_elements table, enriched with calendar date dimensions and currency information.  It offers a granular view of each pricing condition, including its attributes, associated accounts, and relevant dates.

description.value: Condition exchange rate for conversion to local currency
Numerator for converting condition units to base units
Denominator for converting condition units to base units
Number of condition record from batch determination
Rounding off difference of the condition
Indicator for maximum condition base value
Scale base value of the condition
Updated information in related user data field
Identifier of CPF formula in document
Process conditions with value equal to zero
Statistical and relevant for account determination
Data filter value for data aging
